alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 6:01AM AKST until February 15 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONTAL PASSAGE WEDNESDAY... .Snowfall rates have been lighter than expected for some locations, but still steadily adding up. Many locations will start mixing with rain through mid morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Angoon, Kake, and Petersburg areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixing with rain is likely Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
